title: What are the laws on mopeds if on the streets of Wilmington.  There are more and more of them out there and is seems like they are slowing the flow of traffic down, driving in the middle of the road, and some seem to think the street laws don\'t apply to them.
text:
This link to search results at MyReporter.com should answer most of
your questions: http://www.myreporter.com/?s=moped+AND+scooter
